CustomField.formula: IF(RecordType.DeveloperName ='DoppioPresidio' && ((PTF_HistoryRoleCode__c== '069') || (PTF_HistoryRoleCode__c== 'F_905') || (PTF_HistoryRoleCode__c== '144') || (PTF_HistoryRoleCode__c== 'F_140') || (PTF_HistoryRoleCode__c== '100') || (PTF_HistoryRoleCode__c== 'F_144')) , 'Private', IF(RecordType.DeveloperName ='DoppioPresidio' && ((PTF_HistoryRoleCode__c== 'F_912') || (PTF_HistoryRoleCode__c== 'F_914') || (PTF_HistoryRoleCode__c== '065')) , 'Key Client Privati', IF(RecordType.DeveloperName ='DoppioPresidio' && ((PTF_HistoryRoleCode__c== '991') || (PTF_HistoryRoleCode__c== '990')) , 'Consulenti Finanziari',null)))
CustomField.label: PTF MMDS DoppioPresidio
